name: Klaviyo
description: Integrate with Klaviyo to list, create, list and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Profiles
tools.description: List profiles (contacts) from Klaviyo. Supports filtering by email and pagination.

tools.name: Create Event
tools.description: Track a custom event in Klaviyo. Events are used for triggering flows, segmentation, and analytics.

tools.name: List Campaigns
tools.description: List email campaigns from Klaviyo. Returns campaign names, statuses, and send times.

tools.name: List Flows
tools.description: List automation flows from Klaviyo. Returns flow names, statuses, and trigger types.

tools.name: Get Metrics
tools.description: List available metrics (event types) in Klaviyo. Returns metric names, integration sources, and IDs.
